page.title: 14Holidays and vacations
page.content: Many smaller farmers in particular find it hard to get away for holidays and there are many 'day trips' organized throughout the area perhaps just to the nearest seaside (eg Borth, Aberystwyth) or to interesting places further afield. A local travel club has trips abroad on a regular basis. The trips tend to be patronized mainly by elderly folk, mothers and children since farmers find it hard to get away for any length of time unless a relative can take over in their absence. Affluent families may well take several holidays, often abroad (Yugoslavia is very popular!) in contrast to the majority where a few days at the seaside is their ultimate expectation.
